import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' const PostScreen = () => { const [post, setPost] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchSerials = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/v1/posts/${match.params.id}`) // console.log(data) setSerial(data) } fetchSerials() // eslint-disable-next-line }, [match]) return ( <> Go Back

{serial.name}
{serial.alias}
{serial.description}
 ) } export default PostScreen
